descriptionHtml:
Many parts of skyrim are pretty cold so i wanted to make a unique fur armor set that looked warm and had a little better protection. There are pouches in the back of the fur armor so i added a small carry bonus that is slightly offset by the added armor weight. The full set bonus is better than fur but not as good as leather armor.

Crafting requires Deer hides that can be hunted or purchased.

Chest: Tempering requires arcane blacksmith
Base Armor Rating: 24 +20 carry weight.

Gauntlets
Base Armor Rating: 7

Boots
Base Armor Rating: 7

Helmet
Base Armor Rating: 12

Install with NMM or manually place in Data folder.

If you want to use the non vanilla texture download aMidianBorn Fur Armor. The other mods in the posing pick are jaySuS Swords and Cloaks Of Skyrim.
author: falloutpc
